entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
As we slow the spread of the coronavirus, Pres. Trump & the White House Coronavirus Task Force have expanded testing & sent supplies to areas in need.
—Authorized 50+ diagnostic tests, including at-home tests
—Delivered $1.4B to 13,000 community health care centers across the US
